actions.name: Solid Rock

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a super-effective attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a super-effective attack.
Effect: Connection - Endure. The user freely uses Endure. When under the effect of Endure, all incoming damage from attacks is reduced by 20%

system.description:
